entry.title: Optimal Order Quantity for Newsvendor Problem
Markdown Memo II
entry.content:
📘 Other magic usage that may need to be used in markdown.

1 Note

😕 Input

😯 Output

default note

primary note

success note

info note

warning note

danger note

2 Tabs

😕 Input

😯 Output

  • tab 1
  • tab 2
  • A

This is tab 1.

This is tab 2.

This is tab A, change the default name to A.

3 Label

😕 Input

😯 Output

默认主要成功信息警告危险

entry.title: Markdown Memo I
entry.content:
📘 The common usage of markdown can be used in the hexo environment.

1 Title

😕 Input

😯 Output

Example of Level 1 Title

Example of Level 2 Title

Example of Level 3 Title

Example of Level 4 Title

Example of Level 5 Title

2 Paragraph

😕 Input

😯 Output

Italicized text
Bold text
Bold italic text
Line-through
Underline text
Color text

Centered text

Right aligned text


(A blank line above)

(A dividing line)

3 List

3.1 Unordered List

😕 Input

😯 Output

  • First item of unordered list
  • Second item of unordered list
  • Third item of unordered list

3.2 Ordered List

😕 Input

😯 Output

  1. First item of ordered list
  2. Second item of ordered list
  3. Third item of ordered list

3.3 Nested List

😕 Input

😯 Output

  1. First item:
    • First nested element of the first item
    • Second nested element of the first item
  2. Second item:
    • First nested element of the second item
    • Second nested element of the second item

4 Block

4.1 Common usage

😕 Input

😯 Output

Yimmy’s blog
Now or never.

4.2 Nested Block

😕 Input

😯 Output

Outer layer

First nested layer

Second nested layer

4.3 列表中使用区块

😕写法 - - -

😯效果 - - -

  • 第一项

    小纪笔记本
    闯进森林，潜入海底

  • 第二项

5 Other common usage

5.1 Link

😕 Input

😯 Output
This is Baidu’s homepage.

5.2 Figure

😕 Input

😯 Output

5.3 Table

😕 Input

😯 Output
tablesgenerator

5.4 注释

😕 Input

😯 Output

哈哈我是注释，不会在浏览器中显示。我也是注释。
(效果就是什么都没有啦~)
